text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to survive your first year at university?
text.Response A:
Sure, I can try to help you with that. I'm not an expert on the topic, but I can share some general tips that might be helpful.

First, make sure to get plenty of rest and eat well. University can be a stressful time, and it's important to take care of yourself.

Second, try to find a balance between work and play. Don't spend all your time studying, but also don't spend all your time socializing. Find a happy medium that works for you.

Finally, don't be afraid to ask for help. If you're struggling with a class or a assignment, don't be afraid to reach out to your professor or a tutor. They're there to help you succeed.
text.Response B:
Sure! Here are some tips for surviving your first year at university:

- Make sure you have all the necessary supplies and equipment.
- Stay organized and keep track of your assignments and deadlines.
- Take advantage of the resources and support available to you.
- Make new friends and get involved in campus activities.
- Enjoy the experience and have fun!

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

514.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to survive your first year at university?

Response A

Sure, I can try to help you with that. I'm not an expert on the topic, but I can share some general tips that might be helpful.

First, make sure to get plenty of rest and eat well. University can be a stressful time, and it's important to take care of yourself.

Second, try to find a balance between work and play. Don't spend all your time studying, but also don't spend all your time socializing. Find a happy medium that works for you.

Finally, don't be afraid to ask for help. If you're struggling with a class or a assignment, don't be afraid to reach out to your professor or a tutor. They're there to help you succeed.

Response B

Sure! Here are some tips for surviving your first year at university:

- Make sure you have all the necessary supplies and equipment.
- Stay organized and keep track of your assignments and deadlines.
- Take advantage of the resources and support available to you.
- Make new friends and get involved in campus activities.
- Enjoy the experience and have fun!
